letter_arrives.speaker: Narrator
letter_arrives.text: A letter arrives in the morning post. The handwriting is your mother's.

read_letter.speaker: Mother
read_letter.text: My dear child, I hope the cafe is treating you well. I wanted to share some wisdom that served me for many years.

advice_1.speaker: Mother
advice_1.text: Remember - a cafe is not just about food. It's about the connections you make. Every customer has a story.

advice_2.speaker: Mother
advice_2.text: And that little one in the cellar... they're more special than you know. Care for them well, and they'll become your greatest companion.

recipe_mention.speaker: Mother
recipe_mention.text: P.S. I've enclosed my recipe for Comfort Stew. It was always a favorite - perfect for cold days and heavy hearts.

letter_end.speaker: Narrator
letter_end.text: You tuck the letter away carefully. Mother's words give you renewed determination.
